pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Beautiful, Customizable, Publication-Ready Summary Tables for Statistical Models // Create beautiful, customizable, publication-ready summary tables for statistical models. 'modelsummary' leverages the power of the 'gt' and 'broom' packages. It can produce tables in HTML, RTF, JPG, and LaTeX formats (text/markdown/ascii tables coming soon). The 'gt' package is hosted on 'Github' by the 'RStudio' organization: http://github.com/rstudio/gt.
